alert.note: Alert for St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 9:00AM CST until March 03 at 1:30AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Mississippi...Louisiana... Pearl River Near Bogalusa affecting Hancock, St. Tammany, Washington and Pearl River Counties. For the Lower Pearl River...including Bogalusa, Pearl River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Bogalusa. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 18.5 feet, woodlands and crop acreage along the river will be flooded. The Bogue Chitto Wildlife Management area will be inundated with water in recreational camps and over access roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 11.1 feet Sunday, March 12. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CST.
